short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies addresses from your tabs to one place!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever needed to copy URLs from several tabs? Now you can! This extension can copy the web addresses from all your tabs in a window, for easy sharing with your friends and family! It also allows for reopening several links into separate tabs.
